select sti.id, sti.code, sti.name, sti.sex, sti.status, sti.dept_id, sti.images, sti.create_date, sti.user_id, sti.pharmacy_id, si.name as shopName, si.code as shopCode, si.images as shopImage from staff_info sti left join shop_info si on (si.id = sti.dept_id) where 1 = 1
AND sti.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{staffInfo.name},'%')
AND sti.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{staffInfo.code},'%')
AND sti.status = #{staffInfo.status}
order by sti.create_date desc
